game.name: Out of Ore
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, LAN Co-op, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A casual heavy equipment experience. Mine ore, Move dirt, Build and repair.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A casual heavy equipment experience. Mine ore, Move dirt, Build and repair.

reviewHighlights.text: I don't have tons of hours in the game, but 80ish hours. But far as I can tell there is many bugs in the game that hasn't been fixed, been in the game...
Started well, then showed true scummy developer by adding paid for DLC before the game is even anywhere near a complete game.
